Bigeye tuna hooks $10,000 at Gisborne Marlin and Tuna Hunt tournament https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/bigeye-tuna-hooks-10000-at-gisborne-marlin-and-tuna-hunt-tournament/TD6TFWL6Q5H2FHZDPDHDLG5NK4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/bigeye-tuna-hooks-10000-at-gisborne-marlin-and-tuna-hunt-tournament/TD6TFWL6Q5H2FHZDPDHDLG5NK4/ Murray Robertson'Boomer' of a tournament ... 'as good as any in New Zealand': Fishing club president Mon, 17 Feb 2025 01:24:29 +0000 Maloni Lauti (left) and the 153-kilogram bigeye tuna that won him the $10,000 first prize for heaviest marlin or tuna at the Gisborne Hunting & Fishing Marlin and Tuna Hunt. Lauti caught it off his brother and skipper Mahe Lauti's boat Hahau. From left, Maloni, his sons Mahe Jr and Foni, Pauli Ma'afu and Mahe.
